entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests timeout #100424
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportTest.MissingImport test fails on CI leg: browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_Threading #100421
  • [API Proposal]: Extend BlobBuilder so consumers can better control allocations #100418
  • dotnet nuget sign error: Unknown error (0xc100000d) #100414
  • .NET 8 Runtime Bad Signature / Certificate for MacOS arm64 #100413
  • [browser][MT] make UI thread not managed/attached #100411
    Future
  • [browser][AOT] CollectionsMarshalTests.GetValueRefOrNullRefClass #100409
  • AVX512 codegen issues #100404
  • Double.TryParse fails on string that has thousands separator. Regression? #100397
  • [API Proposal]: Change Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Environments fields to consts #100396
  • [wasi] Cannot find host wasmtime #100394
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] SignalRClientTests timeouts #100388
  • Add missing RID combinations for Gentoo AND/OR hard-set RID for .NET build #100383
  • Test failure: GC/LargeMemory/Regressions/largearraytest/largearraytest.sh #100382
  • string.IndexOf() on Thai Culture , Windows11, 64 bits, .net5,6,7,8, return incorrect index #100381

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'change >= 0' #100350
  • SortedList allocates memory due to boxing of TKey #100406
  • [NativeAot] win-x86: Funclets getting double called #99687
  • Kmac.IsSupported returns different value in RemoteExecutor #100412
    9.0.0
  • [android] trimmer warning for `System.Private.CoreLib.dll` #100256
  • [mono][wasm] Add interpreter support for calls to UnmanagedCallersOnly EntryPoint without managed delegate reference #95087
    9.0.0
  • [browser][nodejs][MT] Worker script fails to start on NodeJS #87556
    Future
  • Fix breaking change when using lazy loading with webcil #100292
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm Runtime Pack] `<GenerateJSModuleManifest>false</GenerateJSModuleManifest>` should be done in a props file #99491
    9.0.0
  • MetadataLoadContext: Custom attribute enum argument parsing fails for non-core System.Enum-derived type because IsEnum is false #98658
    9.0.0
  • HTTP2 code coverage: add tests for DATA frame with PAD bit set #1503
    Future
  • [mono][interpreter] Occasional failures of GC/Regressions/v2.0-beta2/452950 on OSX arm64 Mono interpreter #100398
  • [ci] Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #99961
  • Byte[] initializer error Expression or initializer expected #100325
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 3/16/2024 1:13:28 AM #99965

PullRequests

Created

  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always zero-init if object contains pointers #100426
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • More general VN const casting #100423
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix optAssertionProp_Update for IND of handle constant replacement #100422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Update dependson for mono perf jobs #100420
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure that Sse3.MoveAndDuplicate correctly tracks supporting SIMD scalar loads #100417
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Disable default and ambient attribute at runtime with a feature switch #100416
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • [browser][MT] smaller thread pool #100415
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] disableManagedTransition on UI thread after start #100410
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix error propagation when calling JSImport of missing JS function #100408
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Add span detection in Enumerable.First(predicate) #100405
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Use macros to form the ARM64 instruction format search table #100403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Reduce false pinning from interp stack #100400
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make it possible to eliminate branches guarded by IsEnum #100399
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make it possible to trim custom attribute artifacts #100395
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Use SoftFP ABI on linux-bionic-arm #100392
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • DATAS tuning changes for small HCs #100390
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix the typo in IOptionsFactory source documentation #100384
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Adding missed synchronization #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: fix count reconstruction problem #100385
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT/win-x86: Enable FEATURE_EH_CALLFINALLY_THUNKS #99718
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix initialization by KMAC #100419
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Allow trimming FeatureGuard and FeatureSwitchDefinition attributes #100263
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Add support for the ISOSDacInterface14 api #100364
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Basic usage docs #100354
    documentation, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Force interpreter to initialize the pointers #100288
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix a linker warning with the JsonSerializerOptionsUpdateHandler #100362
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix exception interception on ARM64 with new EH #100349
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Revert "xor before setcc" opt #100298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][browser] WebSocket works differently depending on if we look up its state or not #99673
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [NativeAOT] Remove TargetAbi.CppCodegen and TargetAbi.Jit #100393
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • [ci] Fix Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #100074
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Eliminate unused virtual methods we detect after optimizations #100286
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove support for non-indirect code headers #100351
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve collided exception performance #100169
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix for stress failure when adjusting effective IP while stackwalking may put it on a wrong instruction. #100376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Data Descriptor Spec #100253
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Remove requirement for building packs to run host tests and infrastructure around restoring test project assets #100324
    area-Host
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FixOptRepeat without VNForCast fix #100355
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FixOptRepeat without optAssertionProp_Update fix #100360
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • FixOptRepeat without AssertionProp handle asserts #100359
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more checking to `GenTreeArrAddr::ParseArrayAddress()` #100327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fixed incorrect reversed condition for GT #100372
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix CA2022 warnings (Avoid inexact read with 'Stream.Read') #100352
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99844
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.5
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98385
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98384
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98383
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.5
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add hash operation counts to OpenSSL to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser][ws] Do not duplicate code executed in `local_on_close` #99685
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
